Summary: Something awakened me to go outside.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sweetwater
There were no other sightings in Sweetwater on or around October 27th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was asleep. i awakened to feel the needed to go outside. across the street over the house in the distance i saw a combination of lights. half asleep i went inside to get my camera and car keys. i came back out and drove toward the lights. they seemed to be traveling away from me and i drove to where i took some photos before the lights were non visible. i came home and went back to bed. the next morning i thought, did i really do that? did i drive my car half asleep toward some lights in the sky and take photos? i got my camera off the kitchen table and looked, and i had taken photos. i downloaded them on my computer and the first one was just darkness. the second was darkness also, but after serching the photo in a magnified field i found a spot. on the lower right side i saw this object. i really think it is was i saw outside when i 1st went out, before i had gotten the camera and followed it in my car. the 1st photo is darkness, 2nd has the object lower right side. seems to be blue sliver w\ white lite in the middle, around the outside of the object was red orange. can someone with a better computer program look at this photo and email me w\ a close up? also there were 2 corp formations in monroe co tn exactly 1yr apart, 2007-2008. scott
